website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its dedicated coin storage box and dual USB ports. However, this is a single unit—if you're looking for dual organizers, consider one of our other picks.
pros: Base is fitted with soft foam for a secure, scratch-free fit
Removable coin box keeps loose change separate
Interior is spacious enough for everyday items like phones, keys, pens, and cards
cons: The USB ports aren't the most reliable, so don't buy it for this feature alone

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Slot not big enough
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this item but, they could have left the coin holder out or made it half the size. The USB connectors are great, but the coin holder is useless. It stayed in place all the way to work, even when braking. I have a Samsung Note 8 with an Otterbox Defender Case. The phone will not fit in largest compartment sideways. I don't think it will fit without the Otterbox Case, to be honest. It's hard plastic and very sturdy, but I was hoping to put my phone in there sideways while driving. The width is okay but the length isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, they are what you need!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal for two of these. Love the chargers. Wish they are slightly bigger, but they did what I need. I basically keep my phone and charger cables and maybe a pair of sunglasses plus my key in one. I only used one so have the other to my dad. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Hon. Richard D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for cars with seats tight to center console
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Just bought a new car and the seats are too tight to use my old gap fillers. This works great for tight spaces, now I have small place to keep my chapstick , gum, mints, a couple slots for my coffee cards, and my favorite part is the change cup with the lid. The change is all in one neat easy to retrieve place. And the double usb is quite convienent too. I will say I do wish the main part was a little larger, not deeper, just longer. Doesn’t hold my phone very well. I have the iPhone Sx max. All in all I love it and will be purchasing another for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Taho

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's good, tested the USB ports and those work fine she only gripe I have and it's a pretty big one is that it's not flexible , most seats and consoles in these new cars are not straight so it's not a very good fit, this item should be moldable to various shapes
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Camargo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It allows you to keep your phone in it even though it's a big one, can save coins and the best part is that it doesn`t occupy much space in the car. The USB interface is very convenient, and the phone can be charged in the box. I would recommend buying for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Cremeens

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.text: I have an Audi A4 and finding a gap organizer has not been easy. Some of them have been cheaply made and others were so wide that it took up an uncomfortable amount of space on the passenger seat. This product resolves both of these issues. Also, it has a removable coin container, which most others do not, Two USB ports solve the charging problem, and the phone is safe to place in the storage box when charging, and will not fall again. It better than anything else I can find and I've looked at nearly everything on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: joanne Adeyemi

customer_reviews.title: Jeep Wrangler 2016
customer_reviews.text: It’s not great but not bad. It’s nice having it there with the compartments and the USB ports are really nice. It looks very cheap but Sturdy. I have a 2016 Jeep Wrangler and it fits alright. I can still use the emergency brake if need be. For $20 I expected a bit more higher quality but it has worked good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall R.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, five stars!
customer_reviews.text: My 2009 E-Class had a slide-out hide-away coin slot, but my new car doesn't. I've been looking for something to hold my coins and other small objects that I may need at my fingertips and reaching in the glove box to retrieve them isn't always a safe choice. It fits perfectly with just one of the two enclosed space/gap adjusters. Moreover, There's no interference with the seat belt connection, nor does it come in contact with me. that over time could hold up, but that remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Reynold Hastings

customer_reviews.title: For the money, but it!
customer_reviews.text: For the sale/discounted price I bought it at, I really can’t complain. The design seems good and it looks good too in my new Subaru Outback. If I were to recommend a modification, I would make it narrower. This would really depend on your vehicle and how much space you have between the seat and the center console.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W.

customer_reviews.title: Did not charge my ipad.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality, and the charging station did not work. I returned this product, and appreciate amazon’s return process. The ability to return a product that doesn't work with no hassle, keeps me a loyal amazon customer.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie F.

customer_reviews.title: Product works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I like everything about this product but most especially the dual USB adapter ports. I have a van and the current ports on my van are located near the floor of the van so it is inconvenient sometimes finding the cord to the charger. AUTOMOR's product provides two easy to access adapter ports that allow me to keep the charger cord nearby so that I can find them easily. I have only had the product for two weeks, but I'm happy with it so far - it has proven to be quite handy! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hykergirl

customer_reviews.title: Not really good. Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Fit is ok but do away with the coin hoder and make it fit better. When i use it i can't use my cup holder. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much, at first I didn't know If I already the correct one for the passenger seat and it turns out that it can be used in either seat. I like it because I can charge two phones at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Wider than stated (2.125")
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be of good quality, but, we ordered it based off the measurement of the width because it was precisely the width available. Unfortunately it did not fit because the full width is not 1.6" as stated, what we received is 2.125" wide, making it not fit. All other measurements seem to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: gizmo401

customer_reviews.title: USB Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but unfortuntly the USB charger stopped working after a week. Bummer. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Muehs

customer_reviews.title: OK product
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice product but isn't working that well for me. I think that there just isn't enough clearance between seat and console.
customer_reviews.author: oldnag45

customer_reviews.title: Ho Hum.. Nothing Fancy
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing. Very cheap looking and not as large as I thought. One of the outlets didn't work but I could fix it by resoldering. Will see how long I use within my truck.
customer_reviews.author: dralexy

customer_reviews.title: I'd highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: received my car gap fillers, and they look great. They seem to be really quality made, and are actually better than I expected, which is a good thing. They make a nice, classy looking addition to my Lexus RX350, and I'm glad I made the purchase. It is very splendid designed with coin boxes and Two USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Hernana Julie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of these little gap-fillers out there but this was the first one I have seen with the charging ports. My order arrived quickly and I've had no issues with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Delinda Kaddatz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. Wish it was longer, and the foam piece isn’t attached well, so removing the unit makes the foam fall off.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time making this stay where it's supposed to be. It was constantly moving. Also just looks really cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Darien Pentlin

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described. No more items slipping down beside seat. Great extra storage, 2 slots for charging phones.
customer_reviews.author: mpb

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I just needed a bit more room in my console and it fits perfectly without taking too much of my passenger seat. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and time!!! JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried twice to get one to work. JUNK, Buy a different or better one!!! Still waiting for refund on second as both shipped back same day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: i like it..
customer_reviews.text: this is a good one for small cars. it fits in my x1 easily and is not in the way of the seatbelt..thank you.

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: I drive an older jeep Cherokee, it doesn't liker to stay in place at all.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for certain cars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for cars needing just a little more space for cell phones
customer_reviews.author: Bill Farley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just as described/pictured. I like that I am now able to use my cup holders for my water and coffee and still have the extra space in this organizer for my sunglasses, chapstick, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It’s Fits very well and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I was pleased with the way it fitted, the only thing I would change is on the coin slot. I would make it black to make it harder to see.
customer_reviews.author: Mikiwi

customer_reviews.title: 1 month and stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved it but it already doesn’t work. So sad. Doesn’t charge. Cord was never pinched or mishandled. It worked for about a month
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with coin storage and stuff but it DOES NOT FIT IN MY CAR. My car is Audi q3 and whenever my car shakes or someone accidentally touches it it falls right off
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The quality, functionality and appearance of this item is great.. sellers delivery and was timely and efficient..

customer_reviews.title: Convenient with extra storage
customer_reviews.text: Flexible to be used in either side of the front seats. Can put small notepad and pen for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: menehune

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: Didnt fit well in the space on my Dodge Journey.
customer_reviews.author: Garomir

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: The item purchased was not as expected. Not a very good fit for my Tahoe since it was always blocking access to the seat belt. Additionally, the extra space it was supposed to provide was no value added. I no longer use this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This item was bought as a gift. Heard so far that it fit great and they loved the item. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Makes life eassier in your car.
customer_reviews.text: Takes away the hassle of losing something down between the seats. It's always convenient to keep your cell charged and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Williams

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Fits between the seat without much fanfare and the storage is functional..., the downside is the charger..., takes an unrealistically LONG time to charge an android
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Recommend putting a command strip on the unit to attach to the center consol, but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and it was packaged nicely. I don't have to worry about the phone or the card will fall into the seat gap, and you can use the USB adapter plug it in the car to charge your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Maik Lara

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these, and my daughter saw it and liked it, so I purchased for her for Christmas this year.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: 1 month and the USB won’t work any more
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first it organized my car where to put the coins mainly and it gave my car 2 USB to plug to be able to charge my phone until it stops working go figure

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly for holding my cell phone and parking pass

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well between seats
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps due to using it in a Hyundai Tucson this did not fit well between the seats. It was rather bulky and made fastening the seatbelts difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Everything listed was included. This seat filler is the perfect size, not to big and not too small. The ability to charge your phone though the seat filler is awesome! Overall this is an excellent product and I would purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Knight

customer_reviews.title: in fits and works good
customer_reviews.text: it keeps things from falling down the cracks and provides organized storage close at hand
customer_reviews.author: palm springs

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product. It has saved me from losing items down into the black hole between the seat and console. It’s also very convenient to have the charging stations. I would buy it again

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bulky and holds very little. Glad I only got 1

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Decent, gets the job done, but is sort of ugly and sits in the gap weird.

customer_reviews.title: Look very good in place.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the car, a great catch all place for things while driving. Slide around.Look very good in place.

customer_reviews.title: Spacesaver and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great addition to placing the small items frequently used at hands reach.

customer_reviews.title: Too Wide
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit in my Rav4. Way too wide to squeeze next to seat. Have to return it.

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my car or any other car I know.
customer_reviews.text: This car gap filler is way to wide for my car and any of my friends cars. I tried to give this away and couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy storage space !
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for a little more storage in a very limited Mazda Miata mx-5 space.

customer_reviews.title: It was just as described.
customer_reviews.text: It takes care of things falling between the seat and console.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Fills the gap next to my seat. Holds my phone and a pair of reading glasses. I no longer have to worry about my phone falling into the space between my seat and the console.

customer_reviews.title: It does not allow the console cup holder room for 2 cups.
customer_reviews.text: To hold phone and to block things from slipping between seat and console.

customer_reviews.title: Handy Car Tool
customer_reviews.text: Allows items in the car to be well organized and easily found. It's also a great relief to no longer have small objects fall between the seats.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Exact same texturization as the black interior of a bmw.
